meanings.meaning: 1. ball; sphere; globe; orb
2. bead (of sweat, dew, etc.); drop; droplet 彼の額には玉のような汗が浮かんでいた。There were beads of sweat on his forehead.
3. ball (in sports) esp. 球
4. pile (of noodles, etc.)
5. bullet esp. 弾; also written as 弾丸弾が彼の頬をかすめた。The bullet grazed his cheek.
6. bulb (i.e. a light bulb) esp. 球
7. lens (of glasses, etc.)
8. bead (of an abacus) esp. 玉, 珠
9. ball (i.e. a testicle) Slang, Abbreviation, See also 金玉 きんたま, esp. 玉
10. gem; jewel (esp. spherical; sometimes used figuratively); pearl esp. 玉, 珠; also written as 璧艱難汝を玉にす。Adversity makes a man wise, not rich.
11. female entertainer (e.g. a geisha)
12. person (when commenting on their nature); character Derogatoryこいつがそんな玉じゃないことなんてとうの昔に解っていたからさ。That's because, you see, I've known he isn't that sort of person from a long time back.
13. item, funds or person used as part of a plot

meanings.type: Noun, Noun, used as a suffix
meanings.meaning: 14. egg Only applies to 玉, See also 玉子

meanings.type: Noun, used as a suffix, Counter
meanings.meaning: 15. okonomiyaki Food, cooking, Only applies to 玉, See also お好み焼き
16. coin usu. だまニッケルは５セント玉です。A nickel is a five-cent coin.
17. precious; beautiful; excellent
球 【たま】、珠 【たま】、弾 【たま】

sentences.translation: There were beads of sweat on his forehead.
Adversity makes a man wise, not rich.
That's because, you see, I've known he isn't that sort of person from a long time back.
A nickel is a five-cent coin.

meanings.meaning: 1. counter for parts, stages, installments, etc. (of a story, series, project, campaign, etc.) esp. as 第〜弾, e.g. 第２弾
2. counter for bullets

meanings.meaning: 1. to flip; to snap; to flick Usually written using kana alone彼は私の顔を指先でぽんとはじいた。He flicked me in the face.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ku' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to repel Usually written using kana aloneこのレインコートは水を完全にはじく。The raincoat sheds water perfectly.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ku' ending, Transitive verb

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to spring; to bound; to bounce ボールははずんで塀を飛び越えた。The ball bounced over the wall.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to be stimulated; to be encouraged; to get lively 彼の胸は期待に弾んだ。His heart bounded with expectation.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to pay handsomely; to splurge; to part eagerly with (money, etc.)

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 4. to breathe hard; to pant; to be out of breath See also 息が弾む いきがはずむ
勢む 【はずむ】
勢む: Rarely-used kanji form.

meanings.meaning: 1. spring (device) Usually written using kana aloneそのばね１個で車の全重量を支えている。That one spring carries the whole weight of the car.
2. spring (in one's legs); bounce Usually written using kana alone, Only applies to ばね, Only applies to バネ
3. springboard; impetus Usually written using kana alone, Only applies to ばね, Only applies to バネ

meanings.meaning: 1. to burst open; to split open; to pop 花火の弾ける音が止むと、急に辺りが静かになる。後に残った火薬の匂いが、なんだか俺をセンチメンタルな気分にさせた。As the popping sound of the fireworks stopped, it suddenly became quiet around me. The smell of gunpowder somehow put me in a sentimental mood.
2. to be bursting with (e.g. youth, laughter, flavor) たまには酒にでも酔ってはじけて日頃の鬱憤晴らしたほうがいいんじゃないか。Isn't it better to get drunk and cut loose once in a while and blow off the tension of daily frustration?
3. to bounce; to bound
